title: Dopamine surges and stroke danger: What happens to the brain when someone takes cocaine
text:
This week, it was revealed that the amount of pure cocaine being consumed in London on average is more than Barcelona, Amsterdam and Berlin combined.

Tests found that the average daily amount of pure cocaine in London is 23kg, or 23,000 grams – with an estimated street value of £2.75m each day.

Forensic scientists from King’s College University came to their conclusions by testing waste water in the capital for benzoylecgonine (BE), the compound produced when the body breaks down cocaine.
